# CODEOWNERS file

### Infrastructure and Deployment Responsibility 
#### Terraform, Helm, and core configuration
/iac/                [@devops-infra](https://github.com/orgs/DE-Nexus-SDV/teams/devops-infra)

### Base Services Responsibility
#### All files and subfolders under the 'base-services' directory
/base-services/      [@base-service-team](https://github.com/orgs/DE-Nexus-SDV/teams/base-service-team)

### Sample Services Responsibility
#### All files and subfolders under the 'sample-services' directory
/sample-services/           [@service-team](https://github.com/orgs/DE-Nexus-SDV/teams/service-team)

### Global Default 
#### Any files not covered above (e.g., ai_assistant, docs, bootstrap, mcp-servers, proto, README etc.)
#### will require review from all four teams as a default safety measure.
* [@devops-infra](https://github.com/orgs/DE-Nexus-SDV/teams/devops-infra) [@base-service-team](https://github.com/orgs/DE-Nexus-SDV/teams/base-service-team) [@service-team](https://github.com/orgs/DE-Nexus-SDV/teams/service-team)
